member.name: T:ImageTools.Controls.AnimatedImage
member.summary: Represents a control, that displays an image or an animated image.

remarks.para: This control only define the 'Image' template parts. This template part renders the image after it is converted to a writeable bitmap.

This class has some breaking changes:
The image is able to render images that has not been loaded yet, but not able to render empty images that are filled after they are assinged. Assign the image again when you change the pixels by code.
This control is only able to render extended images. This reduces the complexity of this class and is type safe. Use the image converter when you directly want to bind string or uris.

Type Description
A string will be transformed to a object with a relative path. A new BitmapImage will be loaded asynchronously and assigned to the internal image element. Only png and .jpeg files are supported usings string directly.
The image source will be directly assigned. No animations will be used.

member.name: T:ImageTools.Controls.ImageEditorContainer
member.summary: Defines a container for editing images, where images can be zoomed or or selected with a selection border.

remarks.para:
This control defines the following template parts:
ImageElement The animated image control, which renders the image that is edited.
ScrollViewer Container of the image. Allows scrolling.
SelectionArea The area which is used to subscribe to mouse events to calculate the selection border.
SelectionBorder A border to select an area of the image. It should be should be filled with a transparent or semi-transparent color.
